title: Exclusive Session: Big Deal
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/05/bigdealbig.jpg "bigdealbig")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/7574-exclusive-session-big-deal/attachment/bigdealbig)  
The **NME Radar** tour is in full swing, packing out every venue that it passes through with **Crack In The Road** favourites **Anna Calvi** and **Grouplove** performing headline and main support sets respectively. However when the tour landed in **Manchester**, it was boy/girl duo **Big Deal** that really caught out attention. Beginning life as ‘**Hard Cheese**‘, **Big Deal** have been gaining the attention of fans and critics alike with their ‘anti twee’ sound, performing stripped down sets which see the band only perform with a guitar each and the harmonies from their vocals. **Crack In The Road** caught up with **Big Deal** before their gig at **Manchester Academy**, and the band were kind enough to let us record a couple of tracks. Enjoy!
